appInfo.serviceIntroBody: Bling is a hyper-local super app that brings your neighborhood closer and more trustworthy. News, trading, meetups, and instant gatherings â€” everything for local life in one place.
appInfo.manualIntro: Tap on each feature below to learn how to use it.

together.title: Together
together.guide:
1. Create a 'Flyer' for a meetup (Jogging, Coffee).
2. Neighbors join and receive a QR Ticket.
3. Host scans the QR code to verify attendees.

localNews.title: Local News
localNews.desc: Real, local stories and community updates
localNews.guide:
1. Share happenings in your neighborhood (RT/RW/Kelurahan).
2. Use tags like #Traffic, #Event to categorize.
3. Trusted neighbors (Verified) get higher visibility.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.desc: Safe and smart secondhand trading with AI checks
marketplace.guide:
1. Upload photos and let AI analyze the item.
2. Get an 'AI Verified' badge for trust.
3. Buyers can pay a 10% deposit to reserve safely.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.desc: Local part-time and professional opportunities nearby
jobs.guide:
1. Post 'Regular Jobs' or 'Quick Gigs' (e.g., Moving help).
2. You can also register your own 'Talent' profile.
3. Chat directly to hire or get hired.

lostAndFound.title: Lost & Found
lostAndFound.guide:
1. Mark the lost location on the map.
2. Set a 'Bounty' to motivate neighbors.
3. When found, mark as resolved to give trust points.

localStores.title: Local Stores
localStores.desc: Discover neighborhood shops and hidden gems
localStores.guide:
1. Store owners can register their shop for free.
2. Neighbors can write reviews and chat for inquiries.
3. Check 'Verified' badges for official businesses.

findFriends.title: Find Friends
findFriends.desc: Connect with nearby people who share your interests
findFriends.guide:
1. Browse profiles in [Explore] or find topics in 'Dongne Talk'.
2. Bookmark neighbors with 'Star(â˜…)'. Add starred neighbors as friends to chat without daily limits.
3. Join a 'Dongne Talk' or write a post to start a group chat.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.desc: Local hobby groups and community circles
clubs.guide:
1. 'Propose' a club idea first.
2. If enough neighbors join, it becomes an 'Active Club'.
3. Enjoy group chats and event boards.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.desc: More transparent local listings and direct deals
realEstate.guide:
1. Filter by Kos, Apartment, or House.
2. Check 'Kos' details like 'Bathroom inside' or 'Electricity included'.
3. Chat directly with the landlord or agent.

auction.title: Auction
auction.guide:
1. List rare items for auction.
2. Buyers place bids in real-time.
3. The highest bidder wins when time runs out.

pom.title: POM
pom.guide:
1. Upload short videos (Shorts) of your daily life.
2. Tag your location or favorite store.
3. Engage with likes and comments.
